languages.text: "Что, думаешь, Леди Теодора не просила меня заглянуть во тьму за спиной тех, кого она прочит себе в наследники?" {n}Идира гортанно смеется.{/n} "Я видела тебя, {name}. Я видела поступь твоего минувшего и раны твоего сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Что, думаешь, Леди Теодора не просила меня заглянуть во тьму за спиной тех, кого она прочит себе в наследники?" {n}Идира гортанно смеется.{/n} "Я видела тебя, {name}. Я видела поступь твоего минувшего и раны твоего сердца."

languages.text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."
languages.original_text: "Что, думаешь, Леди Теодора не просила меня заглянуть во тьму за спиной тех, кого она прочит себе в наследники?" {n}Идира гортанно смеется.{/n} "Я видела тебя, {name}. Я видела поступь твоего минувшего и раны твоего сердца".

traits.locale_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

"What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

"What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

"What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

"What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

languages.text: “你可是西奥多拉夫人的继承人。怎么？难道你以为，她从没让我窥探过你背后的黑暗吗？”{n}伊迪拉用低沉的声音笑了起来。{/n}“我见过你，{name}。我看到了你过去的脚步，以及你心中的伤痕。”
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: “你可是西奥多拉夫人的继承人。怎么？难道你以为，她从没让我窥探过你背后的黑暗吗？”{n}伊迪拉用低沉的声音笑了起来。{/n}“我见过你，{name}。我看到了你过去的脚步，以及你心中的伤痕。”

languages.text: «¿Qué, cree que lady Theodora no me pidió que escudriñara la oscuridad a la espalda de cada uno de sus herederos en potencia?». {n}Idira emite una risa grave.{/n} «L{mf|e|a} he visto, {name}. He visto los pasos de su pasado y las heridas de su corazón».
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué, cree que lady Theodora no me pidió que escudriñara la oscuridad a la espalda de cada uno de sus herederos en potencia?». {n}Idira emite una risa grave.{/n} «L{mf|e|a} he visto, {name}. He visto los pasos de su pasado y las heridas de su corazón».

languages.text: 「何？シオドーラ様があたいに、後継者と目している者たちの背後にある闇を覗いてほしいと頼まないとでも？」{n}イディラは低い声で笑った。{/n}「あたいはあなたを見たことがある、{name}。あなたの過去の足跡と心の傷を見たよ」
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: 「何？レディ・テオドラが私に、彼女の後継者と目している人々の背後にある闇を覗いてほしいと頼まなかったと思いますか？」{n}イディラは低い声で笑った。{/n}「私はあなた、{name}を見たことがあります。あなたの過去の足跡とあなたの心の傷を見ました」
「何？シオドーラ様があたいに、後継者と目している者たちの背後にある闇を覗いてほしいと頼まないとでも？」{n}イディラは低い声で笑った。{/n}「あたいはあなたを見たことがある、{name}。あなたの過去の足跡と心の傷を見たよ」

languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, . I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

languages.text: « Quoi, vous pensez que dame Théodora ne m'a pas demandé de jeter un œil dans l'ombre de ceux qu'elle considère comme ses héritiers potentiels ? » {n}Idira éclate d'un rire profond.{/n} « Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue}, {name}. J'ai vu les traces de votre passé et les blessures de votre cœur. »
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi, vous pensez que dame Théodora ne m'a pas demandé de jeter un œil dans l'ombre de ceux qu'elle considère comme ses héritiers potentiels ? » {n}Idira éclate d'un rire profond.{/n} « Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue}, {name}. J'ai vu les traces de votre passé et les blessures de votre cœur. »

languages.text: "Meint Ihr etwa, Lady Theodora hätte mich nicht gebeten, hinter die Dunkelheit derer zu blicken, die sie als mögliche Erben auserkoren hatte?" {n}Idira lacht mit tiefer Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch gesehen, {name}. Ich habe die Fußspuren Eurer Vergangenheit und die Wunden Eures Herzens gesehen."
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr etwa, Lady Theodora hätte mich nicht gebeten, hinter die Dunkelheit derer zu blicken, die sie als mögliche Erben auserkoren hatte?" {n}Idira lacht mit tiefer Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch gesehen, {name}. Ich habe die Fußspuren Eurer Vergangenheit und die Wunden Eures Herzens gesehen."

languages.text: "Ne yani, Leydi Theodora'nın benden müstakbel vârislerinin karanlık sırlarına göz gezdirmemi istemeyeceğini mi sanmıştın?" {n}İdira, tok bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Seni görmüştüm {name}. Mazinin ayak izlerini, yüreğinde açılan yaraları görmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "What, you think Lady Theodora didn't ask me to peek into the darkness behind the backs of those she sees as her prospective heirs?" {n}Idira laughs in a deep voice.{/n} "I have seen you, {name}. I have seen the footsteps of your past and the wounds of your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yani, Leydi Theodora'nın benden müstakbel vârislerinin karanlık sırlarına göz gezdirmemi istemeyeceğini mi sanmıştın?" {n}İdira, tok bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Seni görmüştüm {name}. Mazinin ayak izlerini, yüreğinde açılan yaraları görmüştüm."
